ABOUT US!

Welcome to Calvary Chapel Tagaytay City,

a vibrant community of believers dedicated to worshiping God, growing in faith, and serving others in the beautiful city of Tagaytay. Our mission is to glorify God by making disciples of Jesus Christ, equipping believers for ministry, and reaching out to the community with the love of Christ. We invite you to join us for our uplifting worship services, engaging Bible studies, and dynamic fellowship opportunities. Whether you are new to the faith or looking for a spiritual home, Calvary Chapel Tagaytay City is a place where you can experience God’s presence, find meaningful connections, and grow in your relationship with Him. Come as you are and let’s journey together in faith and love.

The Founder

In 2015, we felt God calling us from Calvary Chapel Old Bridge, New Jersey, to the mission field in the Philippines. We have excitedly watched God bless us and answer prayers as we’ve taken this step of faith. Following His lead, we have started the 222 Church Multiplication Network!

Pastor. Tony Reyes and Ms. Amber Reyes
